topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53f3011d63687251c7120200#post_53f3011d63687251c7120200
[bq="mariomarc"]"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53f3004e6368722c81160000#post_53f3004e6368722c81160000
like i'm not saying that jump scares don't work
in moderation

when something relies on jump scares you start to see them coming
and for me
the fear doesn't stick afterwords
like sure the monsters do have pretty creepy designs and all
but you stare at it long enough and just goes away
and the fanart of the game hasn't helped either


um

no offense meant...

*hides away*[/bq]

iunno man, everytime i play it just waiting for those thigns to come at you, the fact that you dont know when they are behind the tablet, it scares me far more than the jumpscares.

it jsut creates the perfect ambient so that you are far more scarred of the waiting than the jumpscare itself.

its more about playing it, watching an LP you think you can handle it, but in the actual game it gets into you.
